## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script workflows/integration/multimodal_integration/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name             | type   | description                                                                           |
|:-----------------|:-------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --id             | string | ID of the sample.                                                                     |
| --input          | file   | Path to the sample.                                                                   |
| --output         | file   | Destination path to the output.                                                       |
| --layer          | string | use specified layer for expression values instead of the .X object from the modality. |
| --obs_covariates | string | The .obs field(s) that define the covariate(s) to regress out.                        |
